short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays cart total and calculates potential future value if the money was invested. Supported on: Amazon, Walmart, eBay, & More!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Do You NEED It" will read your cart total during checkout of various websites and try to convince you save your money. "Do You Need It" will display what your purchase total would be worth in the future, given different annual return rates and timeframes. Supported on: Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Target, Nike, & Apple. More websites and features coming soon!
